# aci_ip_address_block #

Manages ACI IP Address Block



## API Information ##

* Class: [fvnsUcastAddrBlk](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/model-doc-latest/docs/app/index.html#/objects/fvnsUcastAddrBlk/overview)

* Supported in ACI versions: 1.0(1e) and later.

* Distinguished Name Formats:
  - `uni/tn-{name}/addrinst-{name}/fromaddr-[{from}]-toaddr-[{to}]`
  - `uni/tn-{name}/ap-{name}/epg-{name}/CtrlrAddrInst-{name}/fromaddr-[{from}]-toaddr-[{to}]`

## GUI Information ##

* Location: `Tenants (mgmt) -> IP Address Pools -> Address Blocks`

## Example Usage ##

The configuration snippet below creates a IP Address Block with only required attributes.

```hcl

resource "aci_ip_address_block" "example_ip_address_pool" {
  parent_dn = aci_ip_address_pool.example.id
  from      = "10.0.0.2"
  to        = "10.0.0.5"
}

```
The configuration snippet below shows all possible attributes of the IP Address Block.

!> This example might not be valid configuration and is only used to show all possible attributes.

```hcl

resource "aci_ip_address_block" "full_example_ip_address_pool" {
  parent_dn   = aci_ip_address_pool.example.id
  annotation  = "annotation"
  description = "description_1"
  from        = "10.0.0.2"
  name        = "name_1"
  name_alias  = "name_alias_1"
  to          = "10.0.0.5"
  annotations = [
    {
      key   = "key_0"
      value = "value_1"
    }
  ]
  tags = [
    {
      key   = "key_0"
      value = "value_1"
    }
  ]
}

```

All examples for the IP Address Block resource can be found in the [examples](https://github.com/CiscoDevNet/terraform-provider-aci/tree/master/examples/resources/aci_ip_address_block) folder.

## Schema ##

### Required ###

* `parent_dn` - (string) The distinguished name (DN) of the parent object, possible resources:
  - [aci_ip_address_pool](https://registry.terraform.io/providers/CiscoDevNet/aci/latest/docs/resources/ip_address_pool) ([fvnsAddrInst](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/model-doc-latest/docs/app/index.html#/objects/fvnsAddrInst/overview))
  - The distinguished name (DN) of classes below can be used but currently there is no available resource for it:
    - [vnsAddrInst](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/model-doc-latest/docs/app/index.html#/objects/vnsAddrInst/overview)

* `from` (from) - (string) The first unicast address in the address block.
* `to` (to) - (string) The last unicast address in the address block.

### Read-Only ###

* `id` - (string) The distinguished name (DN) of the IP Address Block object.

### Optional ###

* `annotation` (annotation) - (string) The annotation of the IP Address Block object. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.2(1l) and later.
  - Default: `"orchestrator:terraform"`
* `description` (descr) - (string) The description of the IP Address Block object.
* `name` (name) - (string) The name of the IP Address Block object.
* `name_alias` (nameAlias) - (string) The name alias of the IP Address Block object. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 2.2(1k) and later.
* `annotations` - (list) A list of Annotations (ACI object [tagAnnotation](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/model-doc-latest/docs/app/index.html#/objects/tagAnnotation/overview)). Annotations can also be configured using a separate [aci_annotation](https://registry.terraform.io/providers/CiscoDevNet/aci/latest/docs/resources/annotation) resource. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.2(1l) and later.
  #### Required ####
  
    * `key` (key) - (string) The key used to uniquely identify this configuration object.
    * `value` (value) - (string) The value of the property.
* `tags` - (list) A list of Tags (ACI object [tagTag](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/model-doc-latest/docs/app/index.html#/objects/tagTag/overview)). Tags can also be configured using a separate [aci_tag](https://registry.terraform.io/providers/CiscoDevNet/aci/latest/docs/resources/tag) resource. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.2(1l) and later.
  #### Required ####
  
    * `key` (key) - (string) The key used to uniquely identify this configuration object.
    * `value` (value) - (string) The value of the property.

## Importing

An existing IP Address Block can be [imported](https://www.terraform.io/docs/import/index.html) into this resource with its distinguished name (DN), via the following command:

```
terraform import aci_ip_address_block.example_ip_address_pool uni/tn-{name}/addrinst-{name}/fromaddr-[{from}]-toaddr-[{to}]
```

Starting in Terraform version 1.5, an existing IP Address Block can be imported
using [import blocks](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/language/import) via the following configuration:

```
import {
  id = "uni/tn-{name}/addrinst-{name}/fromaddr-[{from}]-toaddr-[{to}]"
  to = aci_ip_address_block.example_ip_address_pool
}
```
